meta.purpose: UI/UX mockup for profile management pages including manage profiles list, create profile form, and edit profile form
meta.notes_for_model: This is a composite mockup showing the profile management flow - the administrative view for managing family profiles. Should feel organized, trustworthy, and family-friendly. Include all three states: profile list, create form, and edit form.

story.one_sentence_brief: A profile management interface showing three states: a centered grid of editable profile cards with pencil overlay on hover, a create profile form card with avatar picker and maturity level selector, and an edit profile form with delete option - all maintaining the warm cinema aesthetic.
story.additional_context: These pages handle family member setup and personalization. Creating a profile should feel welcoming - like adding a new family member to the TV room. Editing should be straightforward. The delete option should be present but not prominent.

scene.subject: A triptych showing three profile management states: LEFT shows 'Manage Profiles' page with 4 profile cards in a centered grid, each showing avatar and name with edit overlay on hover, plus an 'Add Profile' dashed card. CENTER shows the 'Create Profile' form card with avatar display at top (with 'Choose Avatar' button), name input field, maturity level selector (Kids/Teen/Adult as styled cards), and 'Create Profile' gold button. RIGHT shows the 'Edit Profile' form similar to create but with 'Delete Profile' destructive button at bottom.
secondary_subjects: Profile cards with rounded-square avatars (icons like cat, star, rocket)
'Done' back button in top-left of manage page
Avatar picker suggestion (grid of icon options in a modal)
Maturity level cards with icons and descriptions
scene.action: Static UI mockup showing three states of profile management side by side or as a flow
scene.location: Digital web browser frames showing profile management at desktop resolution
scene.mood: Organized and welcoming, like setting up a family activity - administrative but not corporate

composition.shot_type: Multi-panel mockup showing three related page states
composition.framing: Three panels arranged horizontally or as an overlapping flow diagram. Each panel clearly shows its purpose. The create/edit forms are centered card layouts with generous padding.

style.era_or_reference: Netflix profile management elevated with boutique quality - functional settings with delightful details
style.color_palette: Deep night background (#0D0F14), elevated surface cards (#1C2230) for profile cards and form container, cinema gold (#D4A853) for active states and primary buttons, sage green for Kids badge, teal for Teen badge, coral error for delete button, warm white text

lighting.description: Dark ambient background with form cards providing visual focus. Profile avatars have consistent background color. Form inputs have subtle inner styling. Gold accents draw attention to actions.
lighting.color_and_contrast: High contrast between dark backgrounds and card surfaces. Form elements clearly visible. Destructive actions (delete) in contrasting coral color.

format.surface_or_output: Desktop web mockup showing multiple states, suitable for design presentation

constraints.factual_accuracy: Form elements should look functional and properly aligned. Radio/selection states should be clear. Profile cards should be consistent sizes.
constraints.safety_and_rights: Avatar icons should be generic playful icons (animals, objects, shapes), not copyrighted characters.
